title: Update login copy and rebrand 'Inner Circle' to 'CloseCircle'

requirements.text: On the public login/home screen, replace the button text "Sign in with Internet Identity" with a calmer, more emotional English phrase centered on "Log in" (and ensure the loading-state label is consistent with the new wording).

quotes: In homepage, edit "Sign in with Internet Identity" to just "Log in" to something more emotional & calm.

acceptanceCriteria: On the login screen, the primary auth button no longer displays the exact text "Sign in with Internet Identity".
While login is in progress, the button's loading label matches the new copy style (no mismatched "Signing in..." if the button now says "Log in").

requirements.text: Replace every user-facing occurrence of the app name text "Inner Circle" with "CloseCircle" across the frontend UI (including the login screen branding header and the in-app header).

quotes: Change all appearance of "Inner Circle" to "CloseCircle"

acceptanceCriteria: The login screen title shows "CloseCircle" instead of "Inner Circle".
The authenticated app header shows "CloseCircle" instead of "Inner Circle".
No user-facing UI text anywhere in the frontend displays the exact string "Inner Circle".

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Do not change authentication behavior or Internet Identity integrationâ€”only adjust the displayed copy.
Do not change backend types, storage, or canister APIs as part of this request.
